channel.title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump vs. U.S. allies: How will this end?

item.title: Rahm Emanuel steers a course between 'monopolists' and 'Marxists'
item.description: NPR's Steve Inskeep speaks with longtime Democrat Rahm Emanuel about politics in the Trump era.

item.title: Donald Trump, Live From Davos
item.description: It’s striking how clearheadedly and defiantly Europeans are reacting to the president’s provocations.

item.title: Winter Storm Forecast: What to Expect as Snow and Ice Move Across the U.S. This Weekend
item.description: Half the U.S. population will likely see some effect from the sprawling storm that will move across the country this weekend, meteorologists said.

item.title: Some voters who backed Trump say ICE is going 'too far'
item.description: A new focus group of Biden-to-Trump voters weighs in on immigration operations and Trump's foreign affairs leadership on Greenland and Venezuela.

item.title: Three Dead After Shooting in Rural Australian Town
item.description: The shooting happened on a day when Australians were honoring the victims of the Bondi Beach massacre, and just after gun laws were tightened.
